sentences.sContent: He added humor, irreverence, and a strong speaking style that captivated the audience.
sentences.sContent_eng: He added humor, irreverence, and a strong speaking style that captivated the audience.
sentences.sCn: 他的幽默、不恭以及强烈的说话风格吸引了所有的听众。

sentences.sContent: While this combination often manifested itself in irreverence, it also turned him into one of the most tolerant and open-minded of travelers.
sentences.sContent_eng: While this combination often manifested itself in irreverence, it also turned him into one of the most tolerant and open-minded of travelers.
sentences.sCn: 凡此种种集其大成，往往有不敬之虞，但有助于他成为心胸最宽广和最开放的旅行者。
